anime.description: A teaser trailer for its new in-development Ninja Scroll anime, Ninja Scroll Burst. An official release of Ninja Scroll Burst is still under consideration. Note: The trailer originally premiered at Sakura-Con during director Kawajiri Yoshiaki and character designer Minowa Yutaka`s Ninja Scroll panel in April, 2012.

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.
